title: Unforgettable North – 4 Days / 3 Nights

itinerary.day: Day 01: Flight to Piura - Hotel - Free Day

activities.text: Board the plane and transfer to the hotel.
Lunch.
Free afternoon at the beach.
Dinner.
Bonfire and welcome party for the group.

itinerary.day: Day 02: Tumbes: Puerto Pizarro + Mangroves of Tumbes - Ecuador

activities.text: Breakfast.
Full day tour to the Mangroves of Tumbes.
Visit to Puerto Pizarro and the Mangroves Sanctuary, boat ride to islands like Bird Island and Whale Bone Island.
Crocodile farm visit: explanation about these species in Peru.
Lunch.
Beach time and water activities: jet skis, banana boats (optional).
Visit to Ecuador and return to the hotel.
Dinner.
Breakfast.
Visit to Aquapark Piura: the largest pools and water slides in Peru.
Lunch.
Visit to Catacaos artisan center.
Dinner and cultural night at the hotel.
Breakfast at the hotel.
Free time to pack and prepare for departure.
Transfer to Piura airport and flight to Lima.
Return to place of origin.

includes: Pickup and arrival at the school.
Tourist transport Lima – Piura – Máncora – Tumbes – Lima.
03 nights accommodation in Máncora with pool.
03 nights of nighttime recreation (bonfires and beach parties).
Photos and videos of the group throughout the trip.
01 agency staff member who accompanies the entire trip.
Entrance tickets to all tourist sites.
